title: missing message preview
content: I have a desktop and two laptops running Thunderbird ver 140.6. As of today, it was working yesterday, I have lost the message preview feature on the desktop. Everything is working fine on the laptops.
creator: Rosaliy-Lynne

title: I received emails. When I click to read the message there is no message at all.
content: Hi, I received emails. When I click to read the message there is no message at all. Please help.
creator: sales356
